home.text_base_description: Located in a boutique 4 unit building, and steps from the many restaurants, shops and markets of the NOPA corridor, this spacious 1 bed condo combines not just the convenience of the neighborhood, but also the style. Located in the rear of the building with outlooks of the landscaped yard, the home is flooded with great light throughout. This is a spacious condo, with the bedroom easily big enough for a king bed. Huge walk-in custom closet. The main room has both a dining area as well as a living room. There is also an office alcove for working from home. The kitchen with stainless steel appliances, marble countertops and ample storage is perfect for the stay home chef. If one prefers not to cook, Divisadero and its many culinary treats could be your pantry. A remodeled bath offers a floating vanity as well an updated tiled shower over tub. The landscaped yard has been thoughtfully designed with fruit trees, fire pit and BBQ. In-unit washer and dryer, storage and 1 car parking.

Main Level: 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, Living Room, Kitchen
